entry.title: Sunday: Periods of rain or drizzle. High 16.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain or drizzle beginning early this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this afternoon. Amount 5 to 10 mm except 20 mm in areas of heaviest rain. Wind becoming south 20 km/h this afternoon. High 16. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Sunday 08 May 2016

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of drizzle. Low 8.
entry.summary: Periods of drizzle or showers ending before morning then mainly cloudy. Fog patches developing this evening. Amount 2 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low 8. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Sunday 08 May 2016

entry.title: Monday: A few showers. High 15.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. A few showers beginning in the morning and ending in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h in the morning then becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High 15. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Sunday 08 May 2016
